events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue was categorized as Refund based on customer's request for returning a wrong item.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah Johnson for handling the refund request.
Hello, I’m Sarah from customer support. I’m here to help you with the refund process for your order.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue?
Sure, my order number is 123456789, and I've attached a photo showing that the item I got is different from what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a refund immediately and provide a prepaid shipping label for you to return the wrong item.
Thanks for the quick response and refund initiation; I appreciate the ease of the process.
The refund has been processed and should appear on your payment method within 5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm if you have received the refund and are satisfied with how your case was handled.
Since the refund was successfully received and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case.
Please take a moment to complete our short survey about your customer support experience today.
